name: meteor-mdc
description: Wrapper Npm package. Do not publish.

scripts.test-bundle: cd meteor-packages && (cd mdc && npm install && npm test)
scripts.test-sass: cd meteor-packages && (cd mdc-sass && npm install && npm test)
scripts.test-styleless: cd meteor-packages && (cd mdc-styleless && npm install && npm test)
scripts.test-styleonly: cd meteor-packages && (cd mdc-styleonly && npm install && npm test)
scripts.test: npm run test-styleless && npm run test-styleonly && npm run test-bundle
